thread.title: North Charleston City 2
thread.title_full: Candidates for North Charleston City Council, District 2 - Post and Courier

author: postandcourier.com
title: North Charleston City 2
text:
Rhonda Jameson Jerome Rhonda Jameson Jerome Age: 56
Residence: Midland Park
Occupation: Homemaker and Volunteer
Education: Graduated R.B. Stall High School, attended Baptist College of Charleston. Currently attending NLC University for Leadership Training
Political experience: 12 years on City Council
Contact information: (843) 414-7891, ncdist2@comcast.net , rhondajerome.com
 Spoiling my grandchildren.
 During my 12 years on City Council, I have furthered my education of city Government to ensure the safety and wellbeing of the people I serve.
 To continue the push forward with growth of infrastructure and best livability of my constituents of District 2 and city wide.
Ray Lloyd Age: 32
Residence: Oak Bluff
Occupation: bank branch manager
Education: University of South Carolina, Bachelorâ€™s degree in Business administration
 (843) 475-0476, RaymondALloyd@gmail.com , www.RayLloydforcitycouncil.com
 reading, jogging, exploring nature and being with friends I have a passion and dedication for helping my community
 Address the issue of flooding.
